name: Slick Salve Glossy Lip Balm Duo
about: What it is:A barrier-building lip balm duo that quickly hydrates, soothes, and protects dry, chapped lips, providing shine and a sense of relief that lasts all day..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, and Combination.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Uneven Texture.Formulation:Balm.Highlighted Ingredients:- Hyaluronic Acid: Delivers immediate, intensive moisture that replenishes and visibly enhances lips..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Powered by peptides and a tri-ceramide complex to visibly diminish signs of aging, this minty, barrier-building lip-balm duo provides intensive hydration for chronically dry lips, visibly improving their texture over time. The vegan formula protects and soothes, delivering long-lasting results..This Set Contains:- 2 x 0.5 oz/ 15 mL Slick Salve Glossy Lip Balms for Soothing + Hydration
ingredients: -Hyaluronic Acid: Delivers immediate, intensive moisture that replenishes and visibly enhances lips..-Ceramides: Reinforce skinu2019s protective barrier, visibly improving lips..-Rice Bran Wax and Glycerin: Seal in hydration, soften, and condition...Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-38, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ergothioneine, Glycerin, Phytosphingosine, Cholesterol, Portulaca Pilosa Extract, Sucrose Cocoate, Panthenol, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Carbomer, Xanthan Gum, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Sorbitan Isostearate, Mentha Arvensis Leaf Oil, Mentha Piperita Flower/Stem/Leaf Oil, Water/Aqua/Eau.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Glide onto dry, chapped lips. .-Reapply as needed. .-To mask, apply a thick layer overnight and gently wipe off in the morning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s a very good lip balm to use for night time in winter to fix chapped lips. I apply it before bed and always wake up with glossy, soft lips. It stays all night and doesnu2019t move at all. I love the cooling effect, the applicator, and the peppermint flavour too. It is sticky but I find it less sticky than the ole henriksen one. I bought this set during the sales and it was only $24 for 2 lip balms. Thatu2019s a very good price for the quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was using this lip balm to help my severely chapped lips and it did absolutely nothing while being uncomfortable to wear.After using this lip balm for two days it felt really thick to apply and sticky when on my lips. When the lip balm was absorbed my lip continued to be sticky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Had high hopes for this, unfortunately experienced burning, peeling and very swollen red lips from this product. Read the reviews! I read them after and found out I wasnu2019t the only one. I donu2019t typically have sensitive lips, this product is awful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: love this product!! it hydrates my lips and makes them sooo glossy! the only thing I don't like about it is after a while it gets pretty sticky

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wonderful. I would recommend 100%. Plus this is a steal. And leaves your lips super hydrating for hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this set. I got it on sale for $25 so it was soooo worth it. The lip glosses remind me of the mint summer fridays - they have the same tube and applicator! Yes they are sticky, but I honestly don't mind it at all and find them so hydrating and refreshing. If you are looking for a more affordable lip balm like the mint summer fridays, this is for you. I like how it is ina. set of two but both are the exact same lippie, I wish they made one a different flavour.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super sticky, definitely not a fan. Iu2019d only use this before bed because when Iu2019m sleeping the stickiness wonu2019t bother me lol.

reviews.review_text: I am an eczema girlie - I get flares around my mouth and have been looking for something that keeps my lips hydrated and my skin happy, and this product fits the bill! I liked it so much  I bought another set right away, so that I could keep one in my car, at work, in my purse, and on my bed side table. Great product - it feels like thick honey but stays put! I boughanother set right away

reviews.review_text: My daughter and I used this product for a few days and somehow it didnu2019t suit us both. The product is sticky and left our lips kind of burnt from the corners. Wonu2019t recommend it to someone with sensitive skin and lips.

It has a great sweet mint scent with a very faint tingling sensation that lasts for a few minutes and is super glossy! but if you do not like a very sticky lip balm then I would recommend other lip balms.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This feels crazy for me to say but this lip balm has officially taken the top spot for my all time favorite lip balm!! It's the one lip balm I've found that I don't have to re-apply every half hour and I looooove the way it feels. It definitely has the texture and feel of a gloss but leaves your lips feeling so insanely moisturized. 10/10 would recommend.

reviews.review_title: Overall Great Balm! READ BELOW BEFORE BUY
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: To start this off, I am super picky with my lip balms, and have tried almost everything. Overall, these are really good!! The formula for this balm is super thick and glossy. The moisturizing aspects in this lip balm are fantastic, and amazing to see! I love seeing the incorporation of ceramides and glycerin, as they are wonderful humectants. This lasts a super long time, and creates a solid barrier between your lips and the elements, so it is perfect for those like me who live in cold or dry climates. However, I do have some points I think are worth mentioning, that may be a make or break for some people:  Firstly, this lip balm is sticky. You will feel it when you press your lips together. However, for those who suffer from really dry lips, this means that it will stay on all day. The second ingredient in this balm is ethylene/propylene/styrene copolymer. This ingredient is one of the main ingredients used in the bases of lip glosses, so it will be super shiny and partly why this is stickier. Also, one of the main moisturizing ingredients is glycerin. This is an amazing humectant but can be sticky as it is in the sugar family. This also means that this balm has a sweet taste, if that isn't your cup of tea.   Secondly, this product is mint flavoured. It isn't too strong, but its there. For those of you who do not like mint, or are allergic, I would avoid this. The mint also gives a cooling effect, which some people may not like.  My final verdict of this balm is that it works really well, which is what its designed to do. If you are able to look past those aspects, this balm will be super moisturizing and last all day/night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect gifts and one for you and one for your bestie deal!   This is the perfect gloss for topping off lipsticks or lip liner, or wearing it alone !  Beware it is sticky so itu2019ll get some on your hair . The minty feeling helps relax and plumps your lips a bit and it feels and looks amazing ! I highly recommend this to my friends and family. Youll want this set because one lip gloss per bag !

reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Topicals Slick Lip Duo, and Iu2019m impressed with the results! Both products work beautifully together to keep my lips soft, hydrated, and glossy without feeling sticky. The soothing formula instantly relieves dryness and provides long-lasting moisture. The duo feels lightweight but powerful, and I love how it adds a subtle shine. It's perfect for everyday use and gives my lips a healthy, nourished look. Definitely a must-have for anyone who struggles with dry or chapped lips
